item.title: Episode 35: MiniHack
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by Paul Michaels and Kev Smith, to chat about their monthly online meetup they both run. MiniHack is an online tech-agnostic monthly meetup, where teams of between 3 and 6 people compete to produce the best solution to a given problem. In their own words - “Where we meet monthly to come up with cool solutions to pointless problems”. Guests' social links Paul on Twitter Paul on LinkedIn Kev on Twitter Kev on LinkedIn Links from the show MiniHack website MiniHack on GitHub MiniHack on Twitter Promo video Brain**** programming language Dev Picks Tech Community Calendar - by Lee Englestone .
